news_items.title: Hull and East Yorkshire Combined Authority to begin work
news_items.description: The long-awaited Hull and East Yorkshire Combined Authority can now officially begin its work after the final steps were taken by the Government to create the new body.

news_items.title: Proposed memorial gardens
news_items.description: Hull City Council and East Riding of Yorkshire Council have committed to providing permanent memorials to those involved in the Legacy Funeral Director investigation. Access the plans and give your thoughts on the designs through our survey..

news_items.title: Engagement with residents and businesses about safety improvements to Lowgate
news_items.description: We have launched a six-week engagement exercise to provide information and seek feedback from the public and other stakeholders about a series of changes to improve road safety in the Lowgate area of the city centre.
